nodes.text: "Jango's Escape" is a theatrical motif written by John Williams for the score for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and its respective soundtrack. It was written in 2002, and is played during Jango Fett's flight from the planet Kamino.
Either bars of the piece or the entire piece were also used for the GBA and DS versions of the video game adaptation of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, depending on the version.
